EmailTemplate.name: AMS - Late NOC Termination Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Late/Absent NOC - Termination Warning
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Receiving_User.Name}.
Please note the that termination date for the OSCAR {!AMS_OSCAR__c.Name} has been met. Ensure the necessary steps are performed.
To review other records that are nearing termination, access the Late NOC Dashboard
